title: Getting Started With Portis
articleContent:
What is Portis? 

Portis is the first compatible software wallet with the New ShapeShift Platform! A software wallet is a more convenient way of storing your crypto assets. While hardware wallets, such as KeepKey, are more secure, wallets like Portis have no cost barrier of entry, do not require a physical device, and can be logged into from any machine (as long as you remember your password)!

How Do I Create a Portis Wallet? 

Getting your wallet setup to use takes no longer than five minutes. To start, head to beta.shapeshift.com. If you have not connected a wallet previously, the dashboard should prompt you to “Create or connect a wallet”. Next to Portis, click “Select”.


A popup in the upper right-hand corner of the screen will appear. Click “Continue”.

Log in if you have already created an account with Portis.

If you are new, click “Create new wallet".

You're almost finished! Enter a valid email address and password (twice). Click “Register”.

IMPORTANT: If your password is lost/forgotten you will not be able to access your funds without knowing your recovery sentence.  Please see this link for instructions on securing your password/recovery sentence.

That’s it! If successful, you will see “Portis Connected” at the top of beta.shapeshift.com 

Congratulations! You can now track, send, receive, and trade your assets using the ShapeShift Platform.

How to Send

In the Assets tab, you will see what coin/token balances you have. Click on the asset you wish to send and then click “Send”. Enter the recipient address and amount you wish to send. Click “Continue”.

You will be asked to “Sign Transaction on Your Device”. 

Since you are not using a device, a popup in the upper right-hand corner will appear. If everything looks correct, click “Confirm”.

If successful, you will see that the send has completed along with transaction details.

How to Receive: 

Click “Receive” at the top of the platform. Select any asset you wish to receive.

Your receive address and QR code will be displayed.

If you’d like to verify that the address is one of your Portis addresses, click the eye icon.

Confirm that the address is verified and you’re good to go!

 

How To Delete Your Wallet

If for some reason you want to delete your wallet/account, follow the instructions below:

1. Go to the settings/menu page on your Portis wallet.

2. Click "Delete Account".

 

If you have any additional questions please open a Support ticket here or If you need help from Portis directly please follow this link here.
description: The Non-Custodial Blockchain Wallet that Makes Apps Simple for Everyone

title: I Need Help With My Portis Password/Recovery Sentence.
articleContent:
When registering a Portis account, you create a wallet, which is immediately encrypted client-side with a secret that was generated from your password. This password never leaves your device. The Portis servers safeguard only user-encrypted wallets, so you can rest assured that nobody but you can access your wallet or sign any transactions without your consent. However, because the private key used to encrypt your recovery phrase is derived from the password you pick, if you lose your password and recovery phrase, your funds are lost forever. As long as you have access to either, you have control of your funds! 

So please - log in and back up that phrase somewhere safe. It is your only way to reset your password in case you forget it.

How Do I See My Recovery Sentence?

Once you’re connected to your Portis wallet, head to the “Settings” tab of the platform: https://beta.shapeshift.com/settings

Click the drop-down arrow. 

Click “Get Recovery Sentence”.

You will be redirected to: https://wallet.portis.io/recovery-phrase where your recovery sentence is visible. For security, please be sure you are alone when viewing your recovery sentence. 

In the event that you forget/lose your password, you’ll need both the email address associated with your account as well as your recovery sentence.

For more settings, visit wallet.portis.io. From there you can enable/disable 2FA, change password, view recovery phrase, etc. 

If you have any additional questions, please open a Support ticket here or, if you need help from Portis directly, please follow this link here.
description: When registering a Portis account, you create a wallet, which is immediately encrypted client-side with a secret that was generated from your password.

title: Warning: Fake Portis App Phishing Attempts
articleContent:
Portis does NOT have a Google Play or iOS app. The ONLY safe Portis wallet is available at: https://wallet.portis.io.

 

 

All others are scams intended to steal your crypto. Please use caution and keep your funds secure!

 

An example of a FAKE/SCAM "Portis" App:

Questions? contact our support team at: https://portis.io/help.
description: Beware! Portis does NOT have a Google Play or iOS app.
